newest.message:
# Release v4.0.9
## New Features - PKCE allows use of EVEMon without a Developer Account (and by Alpha-only characters) - Skills which can only be trained on an Omega subscription have extra description text - Skill levels which can only be only trained on an Omega subscription are displayed with yellow boxes on the skill list - Home station can be viewed in a tool tip on the character's current location
## Bug Fixes - Alpha/Omega account detection improved - Duplicate industry job notifications have been suppressed - Input focus is no longer stolen by the Custom Label combo box when switching tabs
## Contributors - Peter Han - wbSD - avianrr - wvdvegt - mikeyhalla

release.message:
# Release v4.0.9
## New Features - PKCE allows use of EVEMon without a Developer Account (and by Alpha-only characters) - Skills which can only be trained on an Omega subscription have extra description text - Skill levels which can only be only trained on an Omega subscription are displayed with yellow boxes on the skill list - Home station can be viewed in a tool tip on the character's current location
## Bug Fixes - Alpha/Omega account detection improved - Duplicate industry job notifications have been suppressed - Input focus is no longer stolen by the Custom Label combo box when switching tabs - Multiple crashes relating to outdated dependencies fixed
## Contributors - Peter Han - wbSD - avianrr - wvdvegt - mikeyhalla - Krisscut
